snippet: A new feature, See It, is meant to make it easy to move from reading comments about a show to watching that show.
abstract: Comcast and Twitter announce new feature called See It, which will allow Comcast customers to record and watch television shows mentioned in Twitter posts; two companies are talking with other distributors and channel owners about extending feature to other shows; technology is attempt to smooth connection between TV and the social Web.
lead_paragraph: A new feature, See It, is meant to make it easy to move from reading comments about a show to watching that show.

headline.main: Comcast Hopes to Promote TV Shows in Twitter Deal
headline.print_headline: Comcast Hopes to Promote TV Shows in Twitter Deal
